text:
"Ela estava machucada." Shuhua apontou para sua cabeça. "Mas ela acordou enquanto eu a carregava."
"Na cabeça?" Soojin perguntou. Shuhua assentiu.
"Ela estava sangrando. Mas só um pouquinho." Shuhua fez um sinal de pouco com os dedos e tremeu levemente.
"Está com frio?" Soojin levantou uma sobrancelha.
"Sim." Shuhua riu suavemente. "Muito."
Soojin lhe deu um sorriso suave, muito agradecida que tanto Shuhua quanto Maggie estavam bem. Ela rapidamente se trocou de suas roupas molhadas e colocou um pijama, certificando-se de manter sua barriga e ombros escondidos.
Um trovão fez as duas garotas pularem e Shuhua choramingou, olhando em volta do quarto escuro nervosamente. Soojin correu para o banheiro, vasculhando suas gavetas até encontrar o que procurava.
trans:
"She was hurt." Suhua pointed to her head. "But she woke up while I was carrying her."
"On her head?" Soojin saked. Shuhua nodded.
"She was bleeding, but just a little." Shuhua gestured with her fingers, he body trembling slightly.
"Are you cold?" Soojin raised an eyebrow.
"Yes." Shuhua laughed softly. "Very much so."
Soojin smiled gently, relieved that both Shuhua and Maggie were aright. She quickly changed out of her wet clothes into pajamas, ensuring her belly and shoulders remained covered.
The sound of thunder made both girls jump. Shuhua whimpered, her eyes darting nervously around the dark room. Soojin rushed to the bathroom, sifting through her drawers until she found what she was looking for.
